name: Project Plasma Mobile
description:
CURRENT VERSION: 1.0

THIS GAME HAS BEEN DISCONTINUED AND WILL NO LONGER BE UPDATED AS OF 8TH FEBRUARY 2016.

Introducing Project Plasma Mobile, a revised version of the original Project Plasma available exclusively on Android™ devices!

The PC version of the game can be found here.

This game is a prototype to see how a mobile version of Project Plasma would play out on a mobile device. This is NOT the same as the PC version of Project Plasma and is instead a completely different game that was started from scratch although most of PP's core mechanics are still there.

THIS GAME IS A PROTOTYPE FOR SEEING HOW A MOBILE VERSION OF PROJECT PLASMA WOULD PLAY ON A TOUCHSCREEN DEVICE. DO NOT EXPECT ANYTHING BREATHTAKING (or even decent for that matter) HERE. ON TOP OF THIS I WOULD ALSO LIKE TO SAY THAT THIS GAME IS NOT REPRESENTATIVE OF THE KIND OF GAMES I TEND TO PUT OUT.

Any resource credits have been included in a separate PDF file within the ZIP file.

This game shares the community forum as the PC version of Project Plasma. This can be found here.

FEATURES

  • 10 levels!
    • There are currently only 8 levels to complete right now. Elite levels 9 and 10 will appear in a future update (v1.1) although this update is currently at low priority due to me working on bigger, better games.
  • Six weapons to make use of to your full advantage!
  • Compatible with a wide range of Android-powered devices - enjoy it on your smartphone and your tablet!
    • ARMv7 compatible (and by extension ARMv8)
    • ARMv5 compatible
    • MIPS compatible (and by extension MIPS64)
    • x86 compatible (and by extension x86_64)

The PC version of the game is also available for purchase on itch.io here.
